headline.main: Nazis Rush 3 Fortified Lines To Bar a Russian Invasion; GERMANS TAKE STEPS TO BAR AN INVASION REICH FORTS BUILT TO BAR SOVIET PUSH

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Jan. 2 -- Apparently fearing the possibility of a sweeping Russian counter-offensive, the Germans are reliably reported to be building three lines of defense, two in Poland and the third, designed to protect Germany, along the old German-Polish frontier. The first of these lines is being built along the Polish-Russian frontier. Here the Germans are hastily rebuilding the Russian fortifications which the foreign press has called the "Stalin line."
